content:
TITLE: Validating JSON Schema with jsonschema
DESCRIPTION: Validates a JSON file against a specified JSON schema file using the `jsonschema` command-line tool. Requires the `jsonschema` package to be installed.
SOURCE: https://github.com/cveproject/cvelist/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: Shell Script
CODE:
```
jsonschema -i CVE-2017-1234.json CVE_JSON_4.0_min_public.schema
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Validating JSON File with Python
DESCRIPTION: Validates a JSON file using the `json.tool` module in Python. This checks if the file is a valid JSON document.
SOURCE: https://github.com/cveproject/cvelist/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: Python
CODE:
```
python -m json.tool < CVE-2017-1234.json
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Syncing a Fork with Upstream
DESCRIPTION: Fetches changes from the upstream repository, checks out the master branch, and merges the upstream master branch into the local master branch, effectively syncing the fork with the main repository.
SOURCE: https://github.com/cveproject/cvelist/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: Shell Script
CODE:
```
git fetch upstream
git checkout master
git merge upstream/master
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating a New Git Branch
DESCRIPTION: Creates a new branch named `$YOUR_BRANCH` based on the master branch. This allows for isolating changes related to a specific submission.
SOURCE: https://github.com/cveproject/cvelist/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: Shell Script
CODE:
```
git branch $YOUR_BRANCH master
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Checking Out a Git Branch
DESCRIPTION: Switches the current working branch to `$YOUR_BRANCH`, allowing the user to work on changes specific to that branch.
SOURCE: https://github.com/cveproject/cvelist/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: Shell Script
CODE:
```
git checkout $YOUR_BRANCH
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Pushing Updates to Fork on Github
DESCRIPTION: Pushes local changes from the master branch to the forked repository on GitHub, updating the remote repository with the latest changes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/cveproject/cvelist/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: Shell Script
CODE:
```
git push
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Upstream Git Remote
DESCRIPTION: Adds a remote named 'upstream' to the local Git repository, pointing to the main CVEList repository. This allows for fetching updates from the main repository.
SOURCE: https://github.com/cveproject/cvelist/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: Shell Script
CODE:
```
git remote add upstream git@github.com:CVEProject/cvelist.git
```
